verses.verse: To the chief <S%H5329>Musician,<s%> A <S%H4210>Psalm<s%> of <S%H1732>David.<s%> The <S%H8064>heavens<s%> <S%H5608>declare<s%> the <S%H3519>glory<s%> of <S%H410>God;<s%> and the <S%H7549>firmament<s%> <S%H5046>showeth<s%> his <S%H4639>handiwork.<s%> <S%H3027><s%>

Their <S%H6957>line<s%> is gone <S%H3318>out<s%> through <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H776>earth,<s%> and their <S%H4405>words<s%> to the <S%H7097>end<s%> of the <S%H8398>world.<s%> In them hath he <S%H7760>set<s%> a <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> for the <S%H8121>sun,<s%>

Which <S%H1931><s%> is as a <S%H2860>bridegroom<s%> coming <S%H3318>out<s%> of his <S%H4480>chamber,<s%> <S%H2646><s%> and <S%H7797>rejoiceth<s%> as a strong <S%H1368>man<s%> to <S%H7323>run<s%> a <S%H734>race.<s%>

His going <S%H4161>forth<s%> is from the <S%H4480>end<s%> <S%H7097><s%> of the <S%H8064>heaven,<s%> and his <S%H8622>circuit<s%> <S%H5921>unto<s%> the <S%H7098>ends<s%> of it: and there is <S%H369>nothing<s%> <S%H5641>hid<s%> from the <S%H4480>heat<s%> <S%H2535><s%> thereof.

The <S%H8451>law<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> is <S%H8549>perfect,<s%> <S%H7725>converting<s%> the <S%H5315>soul:<s%> the <S%H5715>testimony<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> is <S%H539>sure,<s%> making <S%H2449>wise<s%> the <S%H6612>simple.<s%>

The <S%H6490>statutes<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> are <S%H3477>right,<s%> <S%H8055>rejoicing<s%> the <S%H3820>heart:<s%> the <S%H4687>commandment<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> is <S%H1249>pure,<s%> <S%H215>enlightening<s%> the <S%H5869>eyes.<s%>

The <S%H3374>fear<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> is <S%H2889>clean,<s%> <S%H5975>enduring<s%> <S%H5703>forever:<s%> the <S%H4941>judgments<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> are <S%H571>true<s%> and <S%H6663>righteous<s%> <S%H3162>altogether.<s%>

More to be <S%H2530>desired<s%> are they than <S%H4480>gold,<s%> <S%H2091><s%> yea, than <S%H7227>much<s%> fine <S%H4480>gold:<s%> <S%H6337><s%> <S%H4966>sweeter<s%> also than <S%H4480>honey<s%> <S%H1706><s%> and the <S%H5317>honeycomb.<s%> <S%H6688><s%>
Moreover <S%H1571><s%> by them is thy <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H2094>warned:<s%> and in <S%H8104>keeping<s%> of them there is <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H6118>reward.<s%>
Who <S%H4310><s%> can <S%H995>understand<s%> his <S%H7691>errors?<s%> <S%H5352>cleanse<s%> thou me from <S%H4480>secret<s%> <S%H5641><s%> faults.

Keep <S%H2820>back<s%> thy <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H1571>also<s%> from <S%H4480>presumptuous<s%> <S%H2086><s%> sins; let them <S%H408>not<s%> have <S%H4910>dominion<s%> over me: <S%H227>then<s%> shall I be <S%H8552>upright,<s%> and I shall be <S%H5352>innocent<s%> from the <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H4480>transgression.<s%> <S%H6588><s%>

Let the <S%H561>words<s%> of my <S%H6310>mouth,<s%> and the <S%H1902>meditation<s%> of my <S%H3820>heart,<s%> <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H7522>acceptable<s%> in thy <S%H6440>sight,<s%> O <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> my <S%H6697>strength,<s%> and my <S%H1350>redeemer.<s%>
